name: Death Score
description:
HELLO THERE!

Thanks for checkin' in!

So I made this game on my own (proudness intensify) in a few days for the ScoreSpace 14 Game jam!

It's actually a pretty simple context, you have to dodge lazers and grab coins to make a huge score before you die... Because You'll die!

The theme for this Jam was merge, so here is the catch: you control 2 character in 2 different map, but by pression X or NumPad0 You can merge both maps to have more space to move, but that also means twice more lasers! 

BIG BIG THANKS to Early Garden for the music! Check his sound cloud :

https://soundcloud.com/earlygarden

Have fun! Be careful, this is goin' to be hard!

PS: apparently Music is stopping on the browser version, I don't know why... If you wanna enjoy the wonderful music EarlyGarden made, please dowload the game
